13 #ifndef AQUATERNION_H
14 #define AQUATERNION_H
15 
16 #include <complex>
17 
18 #include "AScalar.h"
19 
20 struct AQuaternion
21 {
22  std::complex<float> vr0;
23  std::complex<float> vr1;
24 
25  _AI AQuaternion() {}
26  _AI AQuaternion(const AQuaternion& a) : vr0(a.vr0), vr1(a.vr1) {}
27 
28  _AI AQuaternion& operator= (const AQuaternion& x) {vr0 = x.vr0; vr1 = x.vr1; return *this;}
29 
30  _AI AQuaternion(const AScalar& r, const AScalar& i,
31  const AScalar& j, const AScalar& k) : vr0(r.fr, i.fr), vr1(j.fr, k.fr) {}
32 
33  _AI AQuaternion(float r, float i, float j, float k) : vr0(r, i), vr1(j, k) {}
34 
35  _AI bool operator== (const AQuaternion& x) const {
36  return vr0 == x.vr0 && vr1 == x.vr1;
37  }
38  _AI bool operator!= (const AQuaternion& x) const {
39  return vr0 != x.vr0 || vr1 != x.vr1;
40  }
41 
42  _AI AQuaternion operator* (const AQuaternion& y) const {
43  AQuaternion z;
44  z.vr0 = vr0 * y.vr0 - vr1 * std::conj(y.vr1);
45  z.vr1 = vr0 * y.vr1 + vr1 * std::conj(y.vr0);
46  return z;
47  }
48  _AI AQuaternion operator+ (const AQuaternion& x) const {
49  AQuaternion z;
50  z.vr0 = vr0 + x.vr0;
51  z.vr1 = vr1 + x.vr1;
52  return z;
53  }
54  _AI AQuaternion operator- (const AQuaternion& x) const {
55  AQuaternion z;
56  z.vr0 = vr0 - x.vr0;
57  z.vr1 = vr1 - x.vr1;
58  return z;
59  }
60  _AI AQuaternion operator- () const {
61  AQuaternion z;
62  z.vr0 = -vr0;
63  z.vr1 = -vr1;
64  return z;
65  }
66  _AI AQuaternion operator/ (const AQuaternion& x) const {
67  return *this * x.inverse();
68  }
69 
70  _AI AQuaternion& operator*= (const AQuaternion& x) {return (*this = *this * x);}
71  _AI AQuaternion& operator/= (const AQuaternion& x) {return (*this = *this / x);}
72  _AI AQuaternion& operator+= (const AQuaternion& x) {return (*this = *this + x);}
73  _AI AQuaternion& operator-= (const AQuaternion& x) {return (*this = *this - x);}
74 
75  _AI AQuaternion operator* (const AScalar& x) const {
76  AQuaternion z;
77  z.vr0 = vr0 * x.fr;
78  z.vr1 = vr1 * x.fr;
79  return z;
80  }
81  _AI AQuaternion& operator*= (const AScalar& x) {
82  vr0 *= x.fr;
83  vr1 *= x.fr;
84  return *this;
85  }
86 
87  _AI AScalar r() const {return vr0.real();}
88  _AI AScalar i() const {return vr0.imag();}
89  _AI AScalar j() const {return vr1.real();}
90  _AI AScalar k() const {return vr1.imag();}
91 
92  _AI AQuaternion& set_r(const AScalar& a) {vr0 = std::complex<float>(a.fr, vr0.imag()); return *this;}
93  _AI AQuaternion& set_i(const AScalar& a) {vr0 = std::complex<float>(vr0.real(), a.fr); return *this;}
94  _AI AQuaternion& set_j(const AScalar& a) {vr1 = std::complex<float>(a.fr, vr1.imag()); return *this;}
95  _AI AQuaternion& set_k(const AScalar& a) {vr1 = std::complex<float>(vr1.real(), a.fr); return *this;}
96 
97  _AI AScalar dot(const AQuaternion& x) const {
98  return vr0.real() * x.vr0.real() + vr0.imag() * x.vr0.imag()
99  + vr1.real() * x.vr1.real() + vr1.imag() * x.vr1.imag();
100  }
101 
102  _AI AQuaternion conj() const {
103  AQuaternion z;
104  z.vr0 = std::conj(vr0);
105  z.vr1 = -vr1;
106  return z;
107  }
108 
109  _AI AQuaternion mul_conj(const AQuaternion& y) const {
110  AQuaternion z;
111  z.vr0 = vr0 * std::conj(y.vr0) + vr1 * std::conj(y.vr1);
112  z.vr1 = vr1 * y.vr0 - vr0 * y.vr1;
113  return z;
114  }
115 
116  _AI AScalar norm_sq() const {return std::norm(vr0) + std::norm(vr1);}
117  _AI AScalar norm() const {return norm_sq().f_sqrt();}
118  _AI AQuaternion inverse() const {return conj() * norm_sq().inverse();}
119 
120  _AI AQuaternion& normalize() {return (*this = *this * norm_sq().f_invsqrt());}
121 };
122 
123 _AI AQuaternion AScalar::operator* (const struct AQuaternion& x) const {
124  AQuaternion z;
125  z.vr0 = fr * x.vr0;
126  z.vr1 = fr * x.vr1;
127  return z;
128 }
129 
132 
133 _AI AQuaternion nLerp(const AQuaternion& x, const AQuaternion& y, const AScalar& t)
134 {
135  return ((AScalar::One() - t) * x + t * y).normalize();
136 }

153

155  _AI PQuaternion operator- (int index) const {return PQuaternion(ptr - index);}

158  _AI PQuaternion& operator-= (int index) {ptr -= index; return *this;}

164 };
